name: Dungeon & Cube
description: *Dungeon & Cube* Name:  Qirong Yin Project Idea:  You need to collect gold coins to open the doors and defeat the enemies to reach the end. How to play: 1.  Use the WASD keyboard to control character movement 2.  LeftShift to switch between walking and running 3.  C to crouch 4. Space to jump 5.  F to pick up pickable items 6.  E to interact with buttons 7. R to reload
